plot: Martine Bijl performs her own compositions based on everyday life and Hans Christian Andersen's fairy tales. She also performs sketches and duets with her musical guests.
plot_en: Martine Bijl performs her own compositions based on everyday life and Hans Christian Andersen's fairy tales. She also performs sketches and duets with her musical guests.
plot_es: Martine Bijl performs her own compositions based on everyday life and Hans Christian Andersen's fairy tales. She also performs sketches and duets with her musical guests.
title: Martine
